CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Completed'),OR($RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Indirect_Record_Type',$RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Direct_Record_Type')), Text(DATEVALUE( Oppty_Completion_Date__c )-DATEVALUE(Now())),'')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Opportunity remains editable 30 days after Completed.
CustomField.label: Days Until Locked
